title: DOOM 3: BFG Edition [R.G. Mechanics]
description:
The Edition of Doom 3 BFG Edition includes an updated version of the cult shooter Doom 3 as well as the addition to it under the name Ressurection of Evil. In addition to the familiar players in the history of the war of the Martian station Doom fans waiting for a completely new episodes - seven levels under the general title The Lost Mission. On the Doom 3 BFG Edition players can still deeper plunge into the atmosphere of the legendary shooter. Optimize graphics for modern platforms, improved rendering and lighting, support for stereoscopic 3D and 5.1 sound, the new system of conservation at the control points, and support the achievements of Xbox LIVE and prizes PlayStation Network - all this will allow players to enjoy the Doom 3 for the first time. Finally , as a special bonus for the true fans of the series of Doom 3 BFG Edition also contains the original dilogy Doom. Do not miss the opportunity to complete your collection of the best shooters in the best edition with a magnificent collection of Doom 3 BFG Edition.

Updated classics. The same Doom 3, in a slightly modified wrapper.
Now the levels are loaded much faster.
Also included in the publication of the first 2 parts, with the second there is an addon.
Supplement Lost Mission for the Doom 3.
And of course, gamepad support, still dreamed about it?
Are you ready to once again plunge into the world of Doom? Then go ahead!
